mapper.update: update info_contr_check set co_id = #{coId}, check01 = #{check01}, check02 = #{check02}, check03 = #{check03}, check04 = #{check04}, check05 = #{check05}, check06 = #{check06}, check07 = #{check07}, check08 = #{check08}, check09 = #{check09}, check10 = #{check10}, check11 = #{check11}, check12 = #{check12}, check13 = #{check13}, check14 = #{check14}, check15 = #{check15}, check16 = #{check16}, check17 = #{check17}, check18 = #{check18}, check19 = #{check19}, check20 = #{check20}, rec_version = #{recVersion} where co_id = #{coId};
